  • Constructor Details

    • Connection

      public Connection(Socket socket, Server server) throws IOException
      Constructor requires socket and server as parameters for this Connection. Initializes new i/o streams as channel for data exchange through this Connection. Initializes isActive to true, setPlayersAndExpert to false.
      Parameters:
      socket - stored as this.socket
      server - stored as this.server
      Throws:
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations

      public void sendMessage(Message msg) throws IOException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • readMessage

      private Message readMessage() throws com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException, IOException
      Reads data from DataInputStream this.in which is expected in JSON format. The method then converts the JSON into a java object, specifically a Message.class object. The Message object is then returned
      Returns:
      Message read from input stream
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - If the message received contains json syntax errors
      IOException - If there are failed or interrupted I/O operations

    • readMessage

      Reads message of Class object, and casts it into a Message object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Extends Message
      Parameters:
      messageClass - Used for casting
      Returns:
      The message after casting
      Throws:
